content.raw:
We have 4 quantities which are interdependent here: density, mass, MOI and volume (shape). As a future feature, it might be interesting to let the user choose which one they want to "lock". 

For example:

1. Set the density to Iron 

2. Change the shape from a box to a cylinder

3. Currently, the mass stays the same and the density becomes custom. Alternatively, I could have "locked" the density so the mass would have changed instead. Or locked both mass and density, so the new cylinder would be automatically scaled to have the proper volume.

@spaepcke , thoughts?
